C

calculateGrandTotal() - Method in class CashRegister
Calculates the subtotal and the tax total together.
calculateSubtotal() - Method in class CashRegister
Calculates the subtotal of every item that is currently in the prices array list.
calculateTax() - Method in class CashRegister
Calculates the tax for all of the prices added to the prices array list based on the current tax rate.
CashRegister - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a bare bones cash register that will keep a running total of prices added to it, calculate tax based on a tax rate, and calculate a grand total.
CashRegister() - Constructor for class CashRegister
Default constructor.
CashRegister(double) - Constructor for class CashRegister
This constructor initializes a custom tax rate on creation.

setTaxRate(double) - Method in class CashRegister
Sets the tax rate to the value.
